source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT h.[SalesOrderID]
      ,[OrderDate]
      ,[DueDate]
      ,[ShipDate]
      ,[Status]
      ,[OnlineOrderFlag]
      ,[CustomerID]
      ,[SalesPersonID]
      ,[TerritoryID]
      ,[ShipMethodID]      
	  ,[ProductID]
	  ,[OrderQty]
      ,[UnitPrice]
      ,[UnitPriceDiscount]
      ,[LineTotal]
  FROM [AdventureWorks2019].[Sales].[SalesOrderDetail] d
	inner join [AdventureWorks2019].[Sales].[SalesOrderHeader] h on d.SalesOrderID = h.SalesOrderID

SELECT [ProductID]
      ,p.[Name]
      ,[ProductNumber]
      ,[MakeFlag]
      ,[FinishedGoodsFlag]
      ,[Color]
      ,[SafetyStockLevel]
      ,[ReorderPoint]
      ,[StandardCost]
      ,[ListPrice]
      ,[Size]
      ,[SizeUnitMeasureCode]
      ,[WeightUnitMeasureCode]
      ,[Weight]
      ,[DaysToManufacture]
      ,[ProductLine]
      ,[Class]
      ,[Style]
      ,[ProductModelID]
      ,[SellStartDate]
      ,[SellEndDate]
      ,[DiscontinuedDate]   
	  ,c.Name as ProductCategory
	  ,s.Name as ProductSubcategory
  FROM [AdventureWorks2019].[Production].[Product] p
		inner join [AdventureWorks2019].[Production].ProductSubcategory s on s.ProductSubcategoryID = p.ProductSubcategoryID
		inner join [AdventureWorks2019].[Production].ProductCategory c on s.ProductCategoryID = c.ProductCategoryID

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		DueDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		Status as string,
		OnlineOrderFlag as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		SalesPersonID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		OrderQty as float,
		UnitPrice as float,
		UnitPriceDiscount as float,
		LineTotal as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sales
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		id_sk_customer as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> customers
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as integer,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as integer,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as float,
		ListPrice as float,
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(10,0),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ProductCategory as string,
		ProductSubcategory as string,
		id_sk_product as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> product
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		SalesQuota as float,
		Bonus as float,
		CommissionPct as float,
		id_sk_salesperson as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> salesPerson
source(output(
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ShipBase as float,
		ShipRate as float,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		id_sk_shipmethod as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> shipmethod
source(output(
		TerritoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		Group as string,
		SalesYTD as float,
		SalesLastYear as float,
		CostYTD as string,
		CostLastYear as float,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		id_sk_territory as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> territory
sales, customers join(sales@CustomerID == customers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomers
JoinTerritory aggregate(groupBy(id_sk_customer,
		OrderDate,
		id_sk_product,
		id_sk_salesperson,
		id_sk_shipmethod,
		id_sk_territory),
	OrderQty = sum(OrderQty),
		UnitPrice = sum(UnitPrice),
		UnitPriceDiscount = sum(UnitPriceDiscount),
		LineTotal = sum(LineTotal)) ~> Aggregate
JoinCustomers, product join(sales@ProductID == product@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct, salesPerson join(SalesPersonID == BusinessEntityID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesperson
JoinSalesperson, shipmethod join(sales@ShipMethodID == shipmethod@ShipMethodID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joinshipmethod
Joinshipmethod, territory join(sales@TerritoryID == territory@TerritoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTerritory
Aggregate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id_sk_customer as long,
		OrderDate as string,
		id_sk_product as long,
		id_sk_salesperson as long,
		id_sk_shipmethod as long,
		id_sk_territory as long,
		OrderQty as double,
		UnitPrice as double,
		UnitPriceDiscount as double,
		LineTotal as double
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['sales.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appsales

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		SalesQuota as float,
		Bonus as float,
		CommissionPct as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesPerson
source(output(
		TerritoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		Group as string,
		SalesYTD as float,
		SalesLastYear as float,
		CostYTD as string,
		CostLastYear as float,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Territory
source(output(
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ShipBase as float,
		ShipRate as float,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ShipMethod
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as integer,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as integer,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as float,
		ListPrice as float,
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(10,0),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ProductCategory as string,
		ProductSubcategory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Product
Customers keyGenerate(output(id_sk_customer as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCustomers
SalesPerson keyGenerate(output(id_sk_salesperson as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeySalesPerson
Territory keyGenerate(output(id_sk_territory as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyTerritory
ShipMethod keyGenerate(output(id_sk_shipmethod as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyShipmethod
Product keyGenerate(output(id_sk_product as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyProduct
SurrogateKeyCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		id_sk_customer as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['customers.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appcustomers
SurrogateKeySalesPerson sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		SalesQuota as float,
		Bonus as float,
		CommissionPct as float,
		id_sk_salesperson as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['salesperson.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appsalesperson
SurrogateKeyTerritory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		TerritoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		Group as string,
		SalesYTD as float,
		SalesLastYear as float,
		CostYTD as string,
		CostLastYear as float,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		id_sk_territory as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['territory.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appTerritory
SurrogateKeyShipmethod sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ShipBase as float,
		ShipRate as float,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		id_sk_shipmethod as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['shipmethod.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appShipmethod
SurrogateKeyProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as integer,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as integer,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as float,
		ListPrice as float,
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(10,0),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ProductCategory as string,
		ProductSubcategory as string,
		id_sk_product as long
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['products.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> appProduct

content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [ML].[loans_test]
( 
	LoanID [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	CustomerID [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	LoanStatus [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	CurrentLoanAmount [real]  NULL,
	Term [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	CreditScore [real] NULL,
	AnnualIncome [real] NULL,
	Yearsincurrentjob [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	HomeOwnership [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	Purpose [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	MonthlyDebt [real] NULL,
	YearsofCreditHistory [real] NULL,
	Monthssincelastdelinquent [real] NULL,
	NumberofOpenAccounts [real] NULL,
	NumberofCreditProblems [real] NULL,
	CurrentCreditBalance [real] NULL,
	MaximumOpenCredit [real] NULL,
	Bankruptcies [real] NULL,
	TaxLiens [real] NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO

USE [sample]
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = '4Im3zNybHzadbDgaxW5nC9fJIGnwHzXb'
GO

DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand]
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand]
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = 'sp=r&st=2022-03-08T16:00:31Z&se=2022-03-09T00:00:31Z&spr=https&sv=2020-08-04&sr=c&sig=IC34xX9bzm9UTijiQsb0BjlaYjFIgLcK83zjG4aTCVw%3D'

go


IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO



IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapse_adldemost_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_adldemost_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapse@adldemost.dfs.core.windows.net' ,
		 CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE products (
	[ProductID] int,
	[Name] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[MakeFlag] int,
	[FinishedGoodsFlag] int,
	[Color] nvarchar(4000),
	[SafetyStockLevel] int,
	[ReorderPoint] int,
	[StandardCost] real,
	[ListPrice] real,
	[Size] nvarchar(4000),
	[SizeUnitMeasureCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[WeightUnitMeasureCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[Weight] numeric(10,0),
	[DaysToManufacture] int,
	[ProductLine] nvarchar(4000),
	[Class] nvarchar(4000),
	[Style] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductModelID] int,
	[SellStartDate] datetime2(7),
	[SellEndDate] datetime2(7),
	[DiscontinuedDate] datetime2(7),
	[ProductCategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductSubcategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[id_sk_product] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'application/sales/products.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_adldemost_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.products
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE products
GO

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_adldemost_dfs_core_windows_net] 
GO

DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
GO

source:
import azureml.core

from azureml.core import Experiment, Workspace, Dataset, Datastore
from azureml.train.automl import AutoMLConfig
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from azureml.data.dataset_factory import TabularDatasetFactory

linkedService_name = "azureMLst"
experiment_name = "demosynapsest-vuelos_20172018_ld-20220309120544"

ws = mssparkutils.azureML.getWorkspace(linkedService_name)
experiment = Experiment(ws, experiment_name)

df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM default.vuelos_20172018_ld")

datastore = Datastore.get_default(ws)
dataset = TabularDatasetFactory.register_spark_dataframe(df, datastore, name = experiment_name + "-dataset")

from azureml.automl.core.forecasting_parameters import ForecastingParameters

forecasting_parameters = ForecastingParameters(
    time_column_name = "date",
    forecast_horizon = "auto",
    time_series_id_column_names = ["airport_code"],
)

automl_config = AutoMLConfig(spark_context = sc,
                             task = "forecasting",
                             training_data = dataset,
                             label_column_name = "n_flights",
                             primary_metric = "normalized_root_mean_squared_error",
                             experiment_timeout_hours = 3,
                             max_concurrent_iterations = 2,
                             n_cross_validations = 3,
                             forecasting_parameters = forecasting_parameters)
displayHTML("Your experiment in Azure Machine Learning portal: {}".format(run.get_portal_url(), run.id))

run.wait_for_completion()

import mlflow

# Get best model from automl run
best_run, non_onnx_model = run.get_output()

artifact_path = experiment_name + "_artifact"

mlflow.set_tracking_uri(ws.get_mlflow_tracking_uri())
mlflow.set_experiment(experiment_name)

with mlflow.start_run() as run:
    # Save the model to the outputs directory for capture
    mlflow.sklearn.log_model(non_onnx_model, artifact_path)

    # Register the model to AML model registry
    mlflow.register_model("runs:/" + run.info.run_id + "/" + artifact_path, "demosynapsest-vuelos_20172018_ld-20220309120544-Best")

%%pyspark
df = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@adldemost.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/MLExample/credit_train.csv', 
                        format='csv', 
                        sep=",",
                        header=True,
                        inferSchema=True
## Ifheaderexistsuncommentlinebelow
##, header=True
)
# df.show()
df = df.drop('LoanID')
df.columns
